firstMonth.title: First month: Preparation
steps: Writing all texts and spam word checking

items.question: How does the pricing work?
items.answer: Our pricing has two phases. The initial setup (first 2 months) includes complete campaign preparation and launch. After that, you only pay for lead verification and any optional services you need.

items.question: What's included in the initial setup?
items.answer: The initial setup includes account configuration, strategy development, content creation, lead verification, and campaign launch. All the groundwork needed for successful outreach.

items.question: What ongoing services do I need?
items.answer: After the initial setup, you'll need fresh leads. You can also add optional services like A/B testing, campaign management, and custom text sequences based on your needs.

items.question: Can I change or customize my package?
items.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your package size, as well as add or remove optional services at any time. Contact us for custom solutions that aren't listed in our standard packages.
